title: I wish there was a way to always be last pick but always be mid
body:
I hate picking my mid laner so early tbh

If only :'(

replies.body: I wish there was a way to do it on soloq doe

You can if you play a 5 man premade. Solo queue is basically for convenience, but playing on a Team gives you everything else. Consider asking your team if they are willing to pick your champ while you pick theirs and swap :3
